org.qcri.rheem.core.platform

Interface ChannelInstance

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ExecutionResource, ReferenceCountable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    JavaChannelInstance
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractChannelInstance, BroadcastChannel.Instance, CollectionChannel.Instance, FileChannel.Instance, RddChannel.Instance, SqlQueryChannel.Instance, StreamChannel.Instance

    public interface ChannelInstance
extends ExecutionResource
    Represents the actual, allocated resource represented by Channel.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods Default Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Channel getChannel() 
      ChannelLineageNode getLineage()
      Provides a ChannelLineageNode that keeps around (at least) all non-executed predecessor ChannelInstances and OptimizationContext.OperatorContexts.
      java.util.OptionalLong getMeasuredCardinality()
      Optionally provides the measured cardinality of this instance.

      Retrieve the OptimizationContext.OperatorContext of the ExecutionOperator producing this instance.

      Tells whether this instance should be instrumented

      Mark this instance as produced.

    • Method Detail

      • getChannel

        Channel getChannel()
        Returns:
        the Channel that is implemented by this instance

      • getMeasuredCardinality

        java.util.OptionalLong getMeasuredCardinality()
        Optionally provides the measured cardinality of this instance. However, such a cardinality might not be available for several reasons. For instance, the measurement might not have been requested or could not be implemented by the executing Platform.
        Returns:
        the measured cardinality if available

      • setMeasuredCardinality

        void setMeasuredCardinality(long cardinality)
        Register the measured cardinality with this instance.

      • isMarkedForInstrumentation

        default boolean isMarkedForInstrumentation()
        Tells whether this instance should be instrumented

      • getLineage

        ChannelLineageNode getLineage()
        Provides a ChannelLineageNode that keeps around (at least) all non-executed predecessor ChannelInstances and OptimizationContext.OperatorContexts.
        Returns:
        the ChannelLineageNode

      • wasProduced

        boolean wasProduced()
        Tells whether this instance was already produced.
        Returns:
        whether this instance was already produced

      • markProduced

        void markProduced()
        Mark this instance as produced.

      • getProducerOperatorContext

        OptimizationContext.OperatorContext getProducerOperatorContext()
        Retrieve the OptimizationContext.OperatorContext of the ExecutionOperator producing this instance.
        Returns:
        the OptimizationContext.OperatorContext
